Class ParallelServiceExecutor

    public class ParallelServiceExecutor
extends info.aduna.iteration.LookAheadIteration<org.openrdf.query.BindingSet,org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException>
implements ParallelExecutor<org.openrdf.query.BindingSet>
    Parallel executor for FedXService nodes, which wrap SERVICE expressions. Uses the union scheduler to execute the task
    Author:
    Andreas Schwarte
